What to say…  This game is a classic.  I played a lot of CS 1.5, a lot of CS Source, and I enjoy CS:GO just as much.  I like the classic 5 on 5 game, but I also like the variety provided by the other modes deathmatch, arms races, flying scoutman, demolition…

Everyone plays CSGO, I hate CSGO, it is spray simulator, like a fortune wheel, you have to pray for your little spray to hit anyone, and you just move like a train on a rails. I hate CSGO, the entire engine is made for something else, not FPS games. I do not recommend it, but regardless it is the most popular FPS game currently.
